reviewText: These three movies are run to watch and each has a great message.  The characters and situations that tie them together are subtle, but add a great dimension to the story lines.

Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: Each of these three films is excellent on its own, but the three together at a great price is over the top.  The Christmas Shoes is a classic that tugs at the heart strings and I love to watch it every year.  I showed it to my young grandchildren this year and they love it.  The Christmas Blessing is the sequel to The Christmas Shoes and is also an excellent film.  I believe that this deserves to be call a classic as well.  The Christmas Hope is also an excellent film and will bring a tear to the eye of the toughest person.  I enjoy watching all three of these every year and am pleased to be able to add them to my collection.  I would give all three films five stars on their own, but as a collection, I'm sorry that I can't give an even higher rating.  If you love Christmas/Feel Good movies as much as I do, then these are a musst-have for your collection.
Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: I loved each of these 3 movies-they really showed the true meaning of the holiday-it isn't just the presents but love for other people that God wants us to demonstrate

reviewText: All three of these movies are great, but my favorite is "Christmas Shoes", based on the song.  All are really enjoyable, but make sure you have a box of tissues handy- they're real tear-jerkers!

reviewText: These 3 movies are really great family movies.  Very  touching and sad but true to life.  I watch them over and over again.

reviewText: Real inspirational, based on the novels of the same name.  Great movies, but warning, get out the hankies, each one will make you cry.  I'm not a person who cries at every movie, but there are a few that will do it to me - The Champ, Stella and all 3 of these are on that short list.  Very moving.  I love all 3 though.  They are with the pain.dlp
Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: All three of of these movies are great Christmas movies, with a story that tells us that the season is more than buying Christmas presents.  It is about loving ourselves less and being more concerned about others.  They are great family movies!
Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: This is a good combination of movies.  Each of these productions are sweet, heart-filled movies with great messages for the season.
Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: The pricing can't be any better and three holiday movies in one disc... what not to like?  It was nice to be able to see all the films about the red shoes... such lovely stories... timeless!  At times heartbreaking but very uplifting and it brings home the message of family love.
Title: Holiday Triple Feature: Christmas Shoes/Christmas Blessing/Christmas Hope

reviewText: These short stories each have a moral lesson. It's great for the whole family. They convey the true meaning of Christmas that needs to be reiterated today.....not focusing on the commercialization of the season but the reason for the season Christ and values are stated deftly through out each. Great for the whole family.

reviewText: The movie "The Christmas Shoes" is one of my daughter's and I favorite movies.  One of our favorite things to do during the holidays is to watch the movie together and now we have Christmas Blessings too!

reviewText: I would like to rename this movie The Christmas Healing.  What an emotional joy to watch this movie about giving of self for others and giving up the pain that steals joy that is each person's option--pain or despair.  Kudos to everyone who produced and acted in this film.  This is my new favorite secular movie.
